subsection.name: jtensors
subsection.p: The jtensors package package implements a set of vector and matrix types, intended for use in computer graphics software.
See Mathematics for 3D Game Programming and Computer Graphics.

ul.li: 2D, 3D, and 4D immutable vector types in single and double precision versions.
2D, 3D, and 4D mutable vector types in single and double precision versions.
2x2, 3x3, and 4x4 mutable matrix types in single and double precision versions.
Matrix types are backed by direct ByteBuffers in column-major order for efficient interfacing with OpenGL.
